mapper.select: SELECT e.id AS employee_id, e.name AS employee_name, e.sex AS employee_sex, e.birth AS employee_birth, e.rank AS employee_rank, e.education AS employee_education, e.type AS employee_type, e.salery AS employee_salery, e.tel AS employee_tel, e.company_id, e.department_id FROM employee e WHERE e.name = #{name}

SELECT e.id AS employee_id, e.name AS employee_name, e.sex AS employee_sex, e.birth AS employee_birth, e.rank AS employee_rank, e.education AS employee_education, e.type AS employee_type, e.salery AS employee_salery, e.tel AS employee_tel, e.company_id, e.department_id FROM employee e WHERE e.id = #{id}
SELECT company_id, count(id) FROM employee WHERE type = 'contract' AND leave_date IS NULL GROUP BY company_id
SELECT id, month(hire_date), month(leave_date) FROM employee WHERE type = 'contract' AND hire_date >= #{startDate} AND leave_date >= #{startDate} AND now() >= hire_date AND now() >= leave_date

SELECT e.id AS employee_id, e.name AS employee_name, e.sex AS employee_sex, e.birth AS employee_birth, e.rank AS employee_rank, e.education AS employee_education, e.type AS employee_type, e.salery AS employee_salery, e.tel AS employee_tel, e.company_id, e.department_id FROM employee e WHERE e.company_id = #{companyId}
SELECT sex, count(id) FROM employee WHERE type = 'contract' AND leave_date IS NULL GROUP BY sex
SELECT education, count(id) FROM employee WHERE type = 'contract' AND leave_date IS NULL GROUP BY education
SELECT rank, count(id) FROM employee WHERE type = 'contract' AND leave_date IS NULL GROUP BY rank

SELECT concat(convert(age * 10, CHAR(10)), '--', convert((age + 1) * 10, CHAR(10))) AS balance, count(age) FROM (SELECT floor(datediff(now(), birth) / 3650) AS age FROM employee WHERE type = 'contract' AND leave_date IS NULL) AS em GROUP BY age

SELECT e.id AS employee_id, e.name AS employee_name, e.sex AS employee_sex, e.birth AS employee_birth, e.rank AS employee_rank, e.education AS employee_education, e.type AS employee_type, e.salery AS employee_salery, e.tel AS employee_tel, e.company_id AS employee_company_id, e.department_id AS employee_department_id FROM employee e
